text: El juego de las llaves is a Mexican comedy web television series created by Marisa Quiroga and co-produced by Prime Video, Pantaya, and Corazón Films. The first season consist of 10 episodes and the series debuted on 16 August 2019 on Prime Video. The series is stars Maite Perroni, Humberto Busto, Marimar Vega, Sebastián Zurita, Horacio Pancheri, Fabiola Campomanes, Hugo Catalán, and Ela Velden. The series revolves around the lives of four lasting couples who are friends and who decide to be swingers among themselves, also addresses issues such as monogamy in long relationships, self-realization and desire. == Cast == === Main === * Maite Perroni as Adriana "Adri" Romero * Sebastián Zurita as Sergio Morales * Marimar Vega as Gabriela "Gaby" Albarrán * Humberto Busto as Óscar Romero * Horacio Pancheri as Valentín Lombardo * Hugo Catalán as Leonardo "Leo" Cuevas * Ela Velden as Siena * Fabiola Campomanes as Bárbara Cuevas === Recurring === * Mónica Maldonado as Mica * Helena Haro as Carmen * Manuel Vega as Daniel * Alejandra Toussaint as Aurelia * Anahí Allué as Amelia * Mariel Molino as Gala * Sergio Perezcuadra as Emiliano * Luca Valentini as Fidel * Mauro González as policeman == Episodes == === Season 1 (2019) === == Awards and nominations == {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col" | Year ! scope="col" | Award ! scope="col" | Category ! scope="col" | Nominated ! scope="col" | Result ! scope="col" | Ref. |- | 2019 | GQ México | Best Series of the Year | rowspan="2"| El juego de las llaves | | GQ México presenta la decimosegunda entrega de los premios Hombres del Año 2019 la premiación más esperada del año. |- | 2020 | GLAAD Media Award | Outstanding Spanish-Language Scripted Television Series | | The Nominees for the 31st Annual GLAAD Media AwardsHere Are All the Winners From the 2020 GLAAD Media Awards |- |} == References == == External links == * *El Juego de las Llaves on Pantaya * Category:Mexican television series Category:2010s Mexican television series Category:Spanish-language Prime Video original programming Category:Prime Video original programming Category:2019 Mexican television series debuts Category:Spanish-language television shows
